title: SAMSUNG Crystal 4K Pro 125 cm (50 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart TV with Voice Search  (UA50AUE70AKLXL)

product_specification.In The Box: 1N LED TV, 1N Power Cord, 2N Battery - Alkaline(AAA Size), 1 Remocon, 1n Stand-Left, 1N - Stand Right
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Product Warranty and 1 Year Additional on Panel
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear and Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV.The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost.The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features.The process generally covers:Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested.Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settingsQuick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Crystal 4K Resolution: You can watch crisp, sharp, and detailed visuals and scenes on the display of this Samsung TV.
product_description.PurColor: This feature delivers a wide range of shades to ensure optimal picture performance. As a result, you can enjoy an immersive visual experience.

review: Ofcourse its a 4k tv so its very high standerd in picture and very nice in sound also,I didnt use other tv its my first 4k tv so I cant surely say which is best but its reqlly good,I am satisfied with product and installation done after just 4 hrs after delivery it very fast impressive and samsung representative is help full during demo.

I have ordered tv on 8th May it arrived on 12th May
Very fast delivery and the product is very good
The display quality is so good sound quality is 10/10
Display is 10/10
Connectivity is so fast
Overall worth buying

It's value for money product.

Samsung brand name itself is enough to go for it. Delivery was on time and next day installation was done. Amazed with Flipkart as well as Samsung service.

Here's what I will rate out of my experience.

Picture Quality - 5/5
Audio Quality - 4/5
Connectivity - 4/5
App Support - 3.5/5
OS Features - 4/5

As described bezels are really thin and that's looks great on tv.
The Tizen OS boots really fast, it has some pre-installed apps like Netflix, Prime, YouTube and Samsung TV Plus. And yes the remote controller is really minimal and light weight and no extra un-necessary kit.

Go for Samsung as well as Flipkart.

Note - Will update my review with more use.

I'm reviewing after 5-7 days
Pros:
Picture quality is superb as compared to other 4k TVs
Mobile casting is lag free
Good connectivity like pc on TV
Beezle is to less and appears good
Bluetooth song playing interface is good
Required major apps and features are provided
Wall mount is good as compared to other tvs
Both sound bar and TV speakers work simultaneously
Cons:
If you are a sound lover I prefer you to purchase a sound bar coz low sound
Not all apps are available
Some lag in interface while in home usually occurs in all tvs
Overall summary:
If you require a good picture quality and good mobile casting you can go with this blindly but requires a sound bar if u need high sound

1. Sound is average, may require soundbar for theatrical experience.
2. Apps like MX player, Discovery+, epic are not available. App store not much rich in number.
3. Picture quality and contrast outstanding ( blacks are like real black) but Viewing angle average, as It's not IPS panel (I think)
4. Software is Breeze
5. Installation excellent.
6. Bazels are slim looks are beauty, will give heart burn to others
7. Remote is Excellent, sound buttons are like joystick 🕹️
8. Overall i'Il recommend it to buy. (Price is Reasonable)

Very good TV for the money.

Picture Quality is excellent for the price range. Very good level of brightness and contrast. Colors are also very good. 4K videos are really 'Crystal' clear.

Sound is not bad for a mid size room. Room in which I placed TV is around 154 sq.ft. Also, sound has decent base. I was expecting a very mediocre sound quality from the reviews I have seen. But I'm more than satisfied after experiencing it.

Connectivity is very good. Its getting connected to wifi networks almost instantly. But once your modem gets off and turns back on, then you may have to go back to network settings and connect manually. Its only 2 days since I'm using it. May be there are some other better ways to connect. Let me see. I'm using Airtel connection. Its playing videos without any buffering issues.

Mobile casting is also working fine. Once connected, its playing everything smoothly. A small lag of less than 1 second is observed while mobile screen is cast on tv. But the lag is not for sound alone. Its for the video too. So there will not be any lip sync issue.

Its playing .avi, .mp4, .mkv, .webm formats. I have not tried any formats other than these so far.

Upscaling of HD contents to 4k is working nicely. Videos are playing smoothly. I have visited many electronic shops here and observed some other 4K TVs of same 43 inch screen size playing Full HD videos at less than full HD clarity and that too with some ghost like flow.. I feel it's very unwise idea to buy cheaper TVs merely going by the specifications they mention. Don't fall for the words like Dolby vision, HDR 10 etc. What's all these gimmicks after all, if the difference is not visible on the screen. May be you can get a mental satisfaction that you are watching 'Dolby vision'. If you doubt me go to a nearby electronic shop and see the difference for yourself.

In my opinion, this TV is a very good choice in the budget segment. And guys, even if you are not satisfied with the sound, you can always buy a sound bar anytime later. But what if the screen is not good enough. There is nothing you can do about it later than to regret. Trust me the sound quality is not so bad the you'll need to buy a sound bar immediately. And the fact that this is not an Android TV has not disappointed me. Tizen is good enough for me.

One last word, please go for this pro version as it has voice assistant. You can dictate what you want to search. Its very difficult to type using the remote. So I think voice assistant is a must feature. Don't mind the price difference of around 2000 for this 'crystal 4k pro' version with normal 'crystal 4k'. Its worth paying extra. And buy a stabiliser for long life of your TV.
